input.onblur: if (this.value == "") {this.value = "To search type and hit enter...";}
input.onfocus: if (this.value == "To search type and hit enter...") {this.value = "";}

<script>
var url=window.location.href ;
if (url.indexOf("?m=1") !=-1) {
document.getElementById("header-wrapper").style.height='auto';
}

 function addcss(css){
    var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
    var s = document.createElement('style');
    s.setAttribute('type', 'text/css');
    if (s.styleSheet) {   // IE
        s.styleSheet.cssText = css;
    } else {                // the world
        s.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
    }
    head.appendChild(s);
 }

var css =".post-outer{height:218px;}";

var url=window.location.href ;
if (url.indexOf("/search/label/") !=-1 && url.indexOf("?m=1") ==-1) {
addcss(css);
$( document ).ready(function() {
$( ".post-outer" ).css( "height", "218px" );
});
}

if (window.location.href == 'https://www.bsmijatim.org/') {
addcss(css);
}
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'>//<![CDATA[
$(document).ready(function() {
// set max dimension
var dimension = 2000;
$('.post-body').find('img').each(function(n,image){
               var image = $(image);
               image.attr({src : image.attr('src').replace(/s\B\d{3,4}/,'s' + dimension)}); 
               image.attr('width','auto');
               image.attr('height','auto');
});
});
//]]></script>

<script type='text/javascript'>//<![CDATA[
$(document).ready(function() {
// set max dimension
var dimension = 2000;
$('#featuredContent').find('img').each(function(n,image){
               var image = $(image);
               image.attr({src : image.attr('src').replace(/s\B\d{3,4}/,'s' + dimension)}); 
               image.attr('width','auto');
               image.attr('height','auto');
});
});
//]]></script>
